Author: jl777c#5810
Content: oh, one more very cool feature would be to skip utxo that is in the mempool

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there is a mempool search function, so you can pass in txid/vout and if it is in the mempool, it will return it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but also this info comes back in the txproof call, so bettter to get it from there as it saves a call.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that will get you into the tx construction code, which is about the only part you havent been into yet

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: error -2002 means it is already spent. so if that is detected, then the utxo can be removed from the list of utxos and a new tx recalculated

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: in order to get the change utxo, you can search mempool by address. this will only work if there is just one utxo in the mempool that pays the address, as there is only one vout field that is returned (the last one)

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: for the user model of all funds in a single (or few utxo), it should still work most of the time, so you can create tx that spends mempool utxo
